message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. I think you'll love it, and I'm confident it will be a great fit for you. I'm willing to start the conversation at $1200000.
I'm very interested in the product, but $1200000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. Is there any room for negotiation?
I understand that $900000 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can do $1000000, and that's as low as I'm willing to go.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $1000000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $950000 for the product. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I'm starting to think we're getting close, but I still need to make a profit. I can do $1050000, and that's my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'm afraid I'll have to consider other options.

I understand you need to make a profit, but I'm not willing to go above $950000. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $950000 and $1050000, so I'll make a new offer of $1000000 is too high, I'll offer $975000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I'm not willing to go below $1050000, but I'm willing to meet you halfway between $975000 and $1050000. I'll do $1012500. That's my final offer, and I'm not budging from there.
